meanings.definition: To control or operate by automation.
meanings.sent1: The factory is automating the production line to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent2: She is automating the repetitive tasks to save time.
meanings.sent3: The robot insisted on automating the chores, much to the family's surprise.
meanings.sent4: His mind works like a well-oiled machine, constantly automating tasks effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The software automating the data entry made the process seamless and error-free.

meanings.sent1: The thermostat automating the temperature adjustments is very convenient.
meanings.sent2: They are automating the sprinkler system to water the garden automatically.
meanings.sent3: The coffee machine took it upon itself to start automating the brewing process.
meanings.sent4: Her instincts seemed to be automating her responses, like a well-trained reflex.
meanings.sent5: The smart home system automating the lights made it feel like living in the future.
